summary: Florence is the capital of Tuscany, Italy, with about 364,000 people living there. It was once a very rich city and is known as the place where the Renaissance began. Many famous artists and writers lived there. Florence has beautiful art, museums, and historic buildings, which make it a popular tourist spot. It's also an important city for fashion and one of Italy's economic centers. UNESCO named its historic center a World Heritage Site in 1982.
title: Florence
